description:
Meet the Femto USB Drive Combo – bright enough to keep you visible. This compact and lightweight front and rear light set is perfect for commuters and recreational riders. Both lights are USB-rechargeable and offer five output modes for up to 15 lumens of brightness. With Wide Angle Optics lenses, they provide 270° of visibility and are IPX7 waterproof. Their versatile mounting straps ensure easy installation, and a secure threaded Composite Matrix cover keeps the USB ports clean. Stay seen and stay safe on the road with the Femto USB Drive Combo.

  • Front light has 3 lighting modes, 1 in steady and 2 in flashing; steady: 15 lumens (6h), flash 1–15 lumens (20h), pulse flash 2–15 lumens (12h)
  • Rear light has 3 lighting modes, 1 in steady and 2 in flashing; steady: 5 lumens (4.5h), flash 1–5 lumens (15h), pulse flash 2–5 lumens (9h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Precisely tuned optics focus the power of each light’s LEDs to maximize visibility
  • Micro USB Cable (included) charges each light – full charging takes ~3 hours per light
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Femto USB Drive Light Set
